divs: Sighting Detailsi dont know why im reporting this nothing gets done no ans. are ever given but here goes. last night around 3am i saw a red and green light float up out of trees sit for a sec then take of no sound could make out shape. and then tonight just a couple of min ago a flash of lightning made me look up to see what looked like a very bright star in the sky. the object never moved but i did start to glow brighter for about 12 sec total, and when the light got bright enogh to start making those cross twinkle glare things bright lights do, it just vanished just like that gone. i cant say that it left or moved the light just turned off. theres my report what will get done with it who knows.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Groesbeck
This sighting has never been favorited.
